About me

Bilingual Professional holding a B.Eng. in Control & Automation and a PGDip in Data Analytics and currently in pursuit of a HDip in Computer Science (Software Development) at SETU to leverage my coding skills. I describe my myself as a dynamic, analytical and problem-solving individual possessing a solid 9.5 years of industry experience which 6.5 years as a manufacturing engineer and 3 years as a Erp implementation engineer using some coding languages like C# and SQL. I am versed in adapting to diverse environments and enjoy having challenging assignments and projects.

Hello, I'm Tiago

I am a versatile software developer who can approach coding projects from concept to implementation.
